## Cartesian3.cross() method

Computes the cross (outer) product of two Cartesians.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static cross(left: Cartesian3, right: Cartesian3, result?: Cartesian3): Cartesian3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | The first Cartesian. |
|  right | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | The second Cartesian. |
|  result | [Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md) | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

[Cartesian3](./toygl.cartesian3.md)

The cross product.
